text: ya 'ayuha alnaas ataquu rbkm, watyewh bamtthal awamrh wajtnab nwahyh, wahdharuu yawm alqiamat aldhy la yughni fih walid ean waladih wala mawlud ean 'abih shyyana, 'iina waed allah haqun la rayb fyh, fala tnkhdeu bialhayat aldunya wzkhrfha ftnsykm alakhra, wala ykhdenkm biallah khade min shayatin aljini wal'ins
